  • Plugins
    version: 0.9

    Shadow Utilities

    Modular shadow helpers for elevation, depth, and visual effects.

    These utilities provide consistent shadow styling based on your elevation map, including base shadows, hover shadows, bottom glow effects, and legacy shadow styles. Designed for performance and theme adaptability with dark mode support.

    Elevation Shadow Utilities

    Apply predefined elevation shadows corresponding to different depth levels using the @include elevation() mixin. Use these to add consistent drop shadows that align with your design system.

    Class Description
    .box-shadow-sm Small elevation shadow (level 1)
    .box-shadow-md Medium elevation shadow (level 4)
    .box-shadow-lg Large elevation shadow (level 8)
    .box-shadow-xl Extra large elevation shadow (level 16)

    Hover Shadow Utilities

    Shadow styles that activate on hover with smooth transitions. Use these to add interactive depth feedback to elements.

    Class Description
    .box-shadow-hover-sm Small shadow on hover
    .box-shadow-hover-md Medium shadow on hover
    .box-shadow-hover-lg Large shadow on hover
    .box-shadow-hover-xl Extra large shadow on hover

    Bottom Shadow Effect

    Adds a subtle blurred shadow below the element using a pseudo-element with CSS filter. The shadow color can be customized via --shadow-bottom-color.

    .box-shadow-bottom is ideal for floating UI elements or cards with soft grounding shadows.

    General Purpose Shadows

    Utility classes for complex or inset shadows to create sunken or raised effects. Use these for stylized visual textures beyond elevation.

    Class Description
    .shadow Complex multi-layer drop shadow
    .sunken Inset shadow effect creating a sunken look
    .raised Legacy raised shadow with light and dark offsets
    .raised2 Legacy complex raised shadow
